data.title: McDonald-Aeberli Funeral Home, Inc.
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - McDonald-Aeberli Funeral Home, Inc. offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Mars, PA and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
data.meta_site_name: All Obituaries | McDonald-Aeberli Funeral Home, Inc. | Mars PA funeral home and cremation
data.text:
George Briercheck Rock Hill, S.C., formerly of Wexford

George Michael Briercheck, age 85, of Rock Hill, S.C., formerly of Wexford, passed away peacefully on Monday, August 12, 2024 at Piedmont Medical Center in Rock Hill. Born in Mt. Pleasant, PA, Mr. Briercheck was the son of the late George Stephen Briercheck and the late Anna Szwed Briercheck. He played high school football and baseball. Mr. Briercheck graduated from the University of Pittsburgh while working full-time at Westinghouse. Over the span of his 31-year career with...
